name: Nonogram galaxy
description:
Nonograms, also known as Hanjie, Griddlers, are picture logic puzzles in which cells in a grid must be colored or left blank according to numbers at the side of the grid to reveal a hidden picture.

※ Logically Resolvable Puzzles

※ Simple & Relaxed

※ + 3,000 Puzzles

※ Support iCloud Save

※ "Various Controls". (Cross Pad + Touch Control + Drag Pad)

※ Support Bluetooth Keyboard, Mouse, Game pad controller

※ Support Game Editor
